tr.td: Value Set: Simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (SMRSq)

title.value: Clinical Response Questionnaire 03 - 90 days post admission

text.value: What is the patient's full name?
Indicate if the person has deceased, regardless of cause.
The date of death of the person. Only the patient has deceased.
Indicate if the patient had a new stroke within 90 days of their first stroke occurrence.

display.value: No significant disability despite symptoms; able to carry out all usual duties and activities.
Slight disability; unable to carry out all previous activities but able to look after own affairs without assistance.
Moderate disability; requiring some help, but able to walk without assistance.
Moderately severe disability; unable to walk without assistance and unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance.
Severe disability; bedridden, incontinent and requiring constant nursing care and attention.

text.value: Indicate the degree of disability or dependence by obtaining the Simplified Modified Rankin Scale Questionnaire (smRSq).
